meanings.definition: The emission of light from a material when an electric current is passed through it.
meanings.sent1: The electroluminescences of the screen made the room glow softly.
meanings.sent2: I learned about electroluminescences in my science class.
meanings.sent3: The electroluminescences of the firefly's tail fascinated the children.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like electroluminescences, lighting up the whole room.
meanings.sent5: The electroluminescences of the stars in the night sky were breathtaking.

meanings.definition: The process of producing light by the passage of an electric current through a semiconductor material.
meanings.sent1: Scientists study electroluminescences to improve technology.
meanings.sent2: The electroluminescences in LED lights are energy-efficient.
meanings.sent3: The electroluminescences of the disco ball created a dazzling effect.
meanings.sent4: His ideas sparked like electroluminescences, illuminating the room.
meanings.sent5: The electroluminescences of the neon sign caught everyone's attention.
